articles.content:

articles.title: Tijjani Reijnders transfer: Man City complete £46.3m deal to sign midfielder from AC Milan on five-year contract
articles.description: Manchester City sign Tijjani Reijnders from AC Milan in a £46.3m deal; the Netherlands international has signed a five-year deal at City; the 26-year-old had the most goals and assists of any midfielder in Serie A last season
articles.content:
Manchester City have completed the £46.3m signing of midfielder Tijjani Reijnders from AC Milan.
The 26-year-old has signed a five-year deal at the club.
Reijnders is a Netherlands international who had the most goals and assists of any midfielder in... [3346 chars]

articles.title: Oxford Physicists Set New World Record For Qubit Operation Accuracy
articles.description: Oxford researchers achieved the lowest-ever error rate for a quantum logic gate—just 0.000015%, or one error in 6.7 million operations.
articles.content:
Insider Brief
Physicists at the University of Oxford achieved the lowest-ever error rate for a quantum logic gate—just 0.000015%, or one error in 6.7 million operations—marking a new global benchmark in qubit control.
The record was set using a trapp... [4328 chars]

articles.title: Webb telescope images frigid exoplanet in strange orbit
articles.description: A planetary system described as abnormal, chaotic, and strange by researchers has come into clearer view with NASA's James Webb Space Telescope. Using Webb's NIRCam (Near-Infrared Camera), researchers have successfully imaged one of two known planets surrounding the star 14 Herculis, located 60 light-years away from Earth in our own Milky Way galaxy.
articles.content:
This article has been reviewed according to Science X's editorial process and policies . Editors have highlighted the following attributes while ensuring the content's credibility:
14 Herculis c (NIRCam). Credit: Webb Space Telescope

articles.title: WA senator Dorinda Cox accuses Greens of being ‘deeply racist’ and says ‘I am not a bully’
articles.description: Senator who defected to Labor says Greens have ‘toxic culture’ and have failed First Nations people
articles.content:
The former Greens senator Dorinda Cox has accused the Greens of being “deeply racist” and insisted that she has never been a bully.

articles.title: In Photos: Strawberry Moon Skims Horizon In Once-In-A-Generation Event
articles.description: The full Strawberry Moon rose on June 10, 2025, as the lowest since 2006 and until 2043 due to the current "major lunar standstill."
articles.content:
Topline
The most southerly full moon for 19 years — the strawberry moon — rose late at night into twilight skies on Tuesday, June 10, 2025. The rare occurrence won’t happen again until 2043. Here are all the best full moon photos from around the worl... [4353 chars]

articles.description: It was an easy decision to choose LARCC when we started out doing our Inny Challenge in 2022,” said a spokesperson for the organisers after this year’s event. “It has continued to be that way – it is a wonderful service.”
